LanguageData.Mashed_Ashlands_AshBlightCanSpread: Enable blighted animals spreading blight through bites and scratches.
LanguageData.Mashed_Ashlands_AshBlightCanSpreadToPlan: Enable blighted animals spreading blight to nearby plants.
LanguageData.Mashed_Ashlands_AshBlightWandersIn: Enable the blighted animal wanders in incident.
LanguageData.Mashed_Ashlands_BlightStormCaravanAmbush: Enable blighted animal caravan ambushes during blighted ash storms.
LanguageData.Mashed_Ashlands_BlightStormBlightAnimals: Enable blighted ash storms randomly blighting wild animals.
LanguageData.Mashed_Ashlands_BlightStormBlightPlayerA: Blighted ash storms can also blight player faction animals.
LanguageData.Mashed_Ashlands_BlightStormBlightNonPlay: Blighted ash storms can also blight non-player faction animals.
LanguageData.Mashed_Ashlands_BlightStormBlightPlants: Enable blighted ash storms randomly blighting crops.
LanguageData.Mashed_Ashlands_BlightStormBlightWildPla: Blighted ash storms can also blight wild plants.
LanguageData.Mashed_Ashlands_BlightStormBlightPlantsN: The average number of randomly selected plants blighted at once: ({0} plants)
